name: More Classic Movie Lines Quiz | Quotes from Movies | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Newman and Redford.

	'Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid'.

questions.text: 'You're trying to seduce me ... aren't you?'.
questions.explanation:
Dustin Hoffman.

	'The Graduate'. To Anne Bancroft.

Charles Laughton.

	'Mutiny on the Bounty'. To Clark Gable.

questions.text: 'After you kissed me, I wiped my mouth. I wiped my mouth!'
questions.explanation:
Bette Davis.

	'Of Human Bondage'. To Leslie Howard.

Joel McCrea.

	'The Virginian'. To Brian Donlevy (Trampas).

questions.text: 'What do you want to do tonight, Angie?'
'We all lead two lives: the life you learn with - and the life you're left with afterwards. '
questions.explanation:
Glenn Close.

	'The Natural'. To Robert Redford. Great line.

questions.text: 'Love means never having to say you're sorry.'
questions.explanation:
Ali Macgraw.

	'Love Story'. To Ryan O'Neal.

questions.text: 'I made it, Ma. Top of the world!'
'What we have here is failure to communicate.' About whom was this said?
